mapper.select: select id, user_id, activity_id, sign_in_days, continuous_sign_in_days, sign_in_dates, created_time, updated_time, version from user_sign_in_record where activity_id = #{activityId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_sign_in_record (user_id, activity_id, sign_in_days, continuous_sign_in_days, sign_in_dates, created_time, updated_time, version) VALUE (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{signInDays}, #{continuousSignInDays}, #{signInDates}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{version})
